name: RideX - Ride-sharing Platform
description: RideX is a smart ride-sharing platform that connects riders and drivers for safe, fast, and affordable city travel.

name: MealBridge - Food Waste Platform
description: A platform that connects food donors with charities to reduce food waste. Features include real-time donor listings, charity matching, and impact tracking.

name: Foodiez - Knowledge Sharing App
description: A recipe sharing platform where users can post, discover, and save recipes. Includes user authentication, recipe rating, and personalized feeds.
